      Blocking variant of HttpServerResponse.push(HttpMethod,io.vertx.mutiny.core.net.HostAndPort,String,io.vertx.mutiny.core.MultiMap).
      HttpServerResponse HttpServerResponse.pushAndForget​(io.vertx.core.http.HttpMethod method, HostAndPort authority, String path, MultiMap headers)
      Variant of HttpServerResponse.push(HttpMethod,io.vertx.mutiny.core.net.HostAndPort,String,io.vertx.mutiny.core.MultiMap) that ignores the result of the operation.
